data.title: Stuart Jarvis - Chief Technical Officer at Prior Scientific
data.meta_description: Stuart Jarvis started their work experience in 1988 at Weld Systems as a Toolmaker until 1993.
data.text:
Stuart Jarvis started their work experience in 1988 at Weld Systems as a Toolmaker until 1993. In 1993, they joined Prior Scientific as the Chief Technical Officer and continues to hold that position.

Stuart Jarvis attended the Cambridge College of Arts and Technology from 1985 to 1988, where they studied Mechanical Engineering. Prior to that, they attended the West Suffolk College of Further Education from 1983 to 1985, focusing on Mechanical and Electrical Engineering. Their early education was completed at Newmarket Upper School from 1979 to 1983.
